text: Celebrate with him! Let all God's angels worship him!32:43. This line is not in the Masoretic text, but does occur in the Dead Sea Scrolls and the Septuagint. It is also quoted in Hebrews 1:6. Celebrate, foreigners, with his people; because he will pay back those who killed his children.32:43. Dead Sea Scrolls and the Septuagint reading. He will punish his enemies, and repay those who hate him;32:43. “Repay those who hate him”: Septuagint and Vulgate reading. he will purify his land and his people.
